description.paragraph: Includes color utilities, statistical graphics, morphing classes, spatial utilities and map projections, text input/output and multi-sketch tools. Together these make the task of creating data visualization sketches much faster by providing code for commonly repeated tasks such as zooming in and out of a sketch, setting up color tables etc. For documentation and examples, see the [gicentreUtils pages](http://www.gicentre.org/utils/).
description.sentence: Assists creation of data visualization sketches.

description.paragraph: It supplies classes and functions for 3d-surfaces, simple physics (nodes, springs, attractors), graphic tablets, ASE-export or asynchronous loading of xml, html and images.
description.sentence: Compilation of various functions belonging to the book GENERATIVE GESTALTUNG (german version) and DESIGN GENERATIF (french version).
A lightweight library for creating animations and transitions.

description.paragraph: For error free working take a look to the [instructions](http://die-seite.ch/?colladaloader) or [forum](http://die-seite.ch/?guest&thema=colladaloader)
description.sentence: imports into Processing kmz or dae files that is created by Google Sketchup 8

description.paragraph: GML is an open file format designed to store graffiti motion data.
These patterns are useful in animation and more.

description.sentence: Create sketches with multiple layers that are drawn independently of one another.

description.sentence: Highly customizable and full featured yet simple to use camera library.
